abstract: Cumulus Media board announces it will replace founder Lewis W Dickey Jr as president and chief executive, and names Mary G Berner as his replacement; company's shares have lost more than 80 percent of their value in 2015.
lead_paragraph: Lewis W. Dickey Jr., a founder of Cumulus, the second-largest radio broadcaster in the United States, is stepping down as president and C.E.O.

headline.main: With Its Stock Price Down Over 80%, Cumulus Media Replaces Its Chief Executive
headline.print_headline: With Its Stock Price Down Over 80%, Cumulus Media Replaces Its Chief Executive

snippet: Lewis W. Dickey Jr., a founder of Cumulus, the second-largest radio broadcaster in the United States, is stepping down as president and C.E.O.
